name: @supercat1337/textfile-reader
description: A utility for reading large text files line by line, with support for pausing and resuming, and saving the line number periodically.
author: Supercat1337

scripts.remove_type_files: del /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd dist && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ../src && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ..
